DOC.brief_summary: This study compare pharmacokinetics Dimebon subject severe renal impairment subject normal renal function oral administration single oral 20-mg dose Dimebon . This study also assess safety tolerability single oral 20-mg dose Dimebon subject severe renal impairment subject normal renal function .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 , Non-Randomized , Open-Label , Single-Dose Study To Evaluate The Pharmacokinetics , Safety , And Tolerability Of Dimebon PF 01913539 In Subjects With Severely-Impaired And Normal Renal Function
